description: Cayenne pepper (Capsicum annuum) is an amazing spice that packs a punch of flavor and adds a delightful heat to any dish. Not only does it work wonderfully in a variety of dishes, but it also has great health benefits. Studies have shown that the capsaicin found in cayenne pepper has been linked to reducing inflammation and having antioxidants, thus lowering the risk of some diseases. Furthermore, inclusion of cayenne pepper to one's diet can even help with weight loss. Cayenne pepper is an incredibly versatile and tasty ingredient, making it a must-have in every kitchen pantry!
